About.heading: ¿Who are we?
About.title: About
About.subTitle: I wonder if I've been changed in the night? Let me think. Was I the same when I got up this morning?
About.text: Programmer with over 6 years of experience in web application development, design, and implementation. Proficient in various platforms. Experienced in cutting-edge development tools and procedures. Strong collaboration skills within a productive team, quick learner, adaptable, and performs well under pressure.

Work.text1: Below is a list of selected projects I have done. If you have any questions or would like to chat about other things I've worked on.
